name: UreaReductionRatio
title: Urea Reduction Ratio
description: Note - "This value set may undergo changes until the HL7 Multiple Chronic Care FHIR IG is formally published in 2024."
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing Urea Reduction Ratio.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an the reduction in urea as a result of dialysis, measured by the amount of urea removed during dialysis as a percentage of the predialysis urea level.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes LOINC codes for Urea Reduction Ratio.),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Urea Reduction Ratio.)

contains.display: Urea reduction ratio in Serum or Plasma
